testcase.name: Search flights with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given I open the VietJet Air website for FlightSearch.......................passed When I select origin "SGN" and destination "BMV"............................passed And I select departure day "21" and return day "25".........................passed And I click search flights..................................................passed Then I should see flight options displayed..................................passed And I select a departure flight and continue................................passed And I select a return flight and continue...................................passed

testcase.name: Search flights with no value for origin
testcase.system-out: Given I open the VietJet Air website for FlightSearch.......................passed When I select origin "" and destination ""..................................passed And I select departure day "21" and return day "25".........................passed And I click search flights..................................................passed Then I should see a flight search error message "Please fill in searching flight information".passed
